EmailTemplate.subject: Finding your volunteer placement - what next?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {!Contact.FirstName},
Thank you so much for confirming your dates and flexibility on location.
Looking at the latest project needs, we are going to introduce you to coordinators of projects we feel might fit with your availability and skills over the next 5-10 days.
What do you need to do now?
Keep an eye out for the email introducing you to projects
Communicate with project directly, to find out all about what they do and what you would be doing on your placement with them
Accept or decline the placement
Confirm to us, if you are taking the placement or not
If not, we will look at other opportunities
Prepare to volunteer - please read...
If you haven’t already we suggest you read the following, to get an idea of what happens now and what to expect volunteering through indiGO Volunteers. It covers…
Who indiGO Volunteers are
What we do in Greece, Serbia & Bosnia
Why are we here?
Things to consider before volunteering
Preparing for your trip
READ NOW >
Thank you
indiGO Volunteers Coordination - Greece

Once a volunteer undertakes to work in such a situation they agree to abide to any conduct or agreements provided by that organisation and are the sole responsibility of that organisation once working with them.
